_comment: Golden file: Expected mainframe output for transaction detail lookup (COTRN01C — READ TRANFILE by ID).
_regulation: FFFS 2014:5 Ch.8 (accurate records), PSD2 Art.94 (transaction retention), GDPR Art.15 (right of access)

_knownDifferences.cardNumberMasking: Mainframe returns full card number in CICS screen. Migrated system masks to last 4 digits per PCI-DSS compliance (intentional security improvement).
_knownDifferences.dateFormat: Mainframe uses MM/DD/YY format (COBOL MOVE). Migrated system uses ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss). Both represent the same instant.
